text: beverage manufacturer license sale of products amend rsa to read as follows the holder of a beverage manufacturer license may sell beverage samples to visitors of legal drinking age for consumption on the premises where the beverages were manufactured a beverage manufacturer may either provide samples for free or for a fee which shall be limited to one glass per label or one glass per person at such times as food is available a beverage manufacturer may serve no more than glasses per person in any areas approved by the commission for the purpose of this section food and beverages may be provided by a third party food vendor prepared on or off the premises a customer purchasing beverage samples to drink may also purchase beverages for consumption off premise at the same point of sale in the licensee s facility
